text: Moshe Rosman Moshe Rosman (1949–present, ) is an Israeli historian specializing in the history of Polish Jews. He is a professor emeritus at the Department of Jewish History in Bar-Ilan University.Rosman at BIU == Awards == 1996: National Jewish Book Award in the Jewish History category for Founder of Hasidism: A Quest for the Historical Ba'al Shem Tov ==References== Category:Bar-Ilan University faculty Category:1949 births Category:Israeli historians Category:Historians of Jews and Judaism Category:Living people
